dc_description_s: The Minneapolis Assessor's Office collects information about all property in the city on a rotating schedule. This is the building data for 2017. The attributes of the data are described below.PIN - this is the unique parcel number of the property that the building is onAssessmentYear - the year for which the data is collectedBLDG_ID - the unique identifying number of the buildingBuildingUse - the building useYearBuilt - the year that the building was constructedAboveGroundArea - the square footage of the building above groundBelowGroundArea - the square footage of the building below groundPrimaryHeating - the type of heating system in placeConstructionType - the type of building materials that make up the framing or base structureExteriorType - the exterior construction of the buildingRoof - the type of roof coverFireplaces - the count of fireplacesBathrooms - the count of bathroomsBedrooms - the count of bedroomsX - the X coordinate of the parcel centroid that the building is on (coordinates are in NAD 83 Hennepin County HARN WKID:103734Y - the Y coordinate of the parcel centroid that the building is on (coordinates are in NAD 83 Hennepin County HARN WKID:103734
